title: Alice's Adventures In Wonderland
description: A beautiful gift edition of Lewis Carroll’s timeless classic, complete and unabridged with stunning illustrations to celebrate the tale’s 150th anniversary. Follow Alice’s adventures as she disappears down a rabbit-hole and meets a cast of curious characters including White Rabbit, the Mad Hatter and the grinning Cheshire Cat... Includes the story of Lewis Carroll and how he came to write this much-loved story, as well as a photograph of the real Alice and internet links to find out more.
author: Lewis Carroll
